name: Jumpex
description:
/ ! \  Epilepsy warning   / ! \

-Jumpex Rules- :

  • Point out the red square with your cursor to Jumpex.
  • You need to avoid any contact between Black & Red
  • Tap or Click to throw/grab the Color Extractor.
  • You can throw the CE only in the air.
  • You can grab the CE only grounded.

-Jumpex Controls- :

  • Mouse Wheel  - Zoom
  • Mouse Pointer - Jump
  • Tap/Click - Throw/Grab CE

source code : https://gitlab.com/Raymondaud.Q/jumpex
